## LoadComponentOptions interface

EluxUI组件加载参数

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LoadComponentOptions 
```

## Remarks

EluxUI组件加载参见 [LoadComponent](./vue-web.loadcomponent.md)<!-- -->，加载参数可通过 [setConfig(...)](./vue-web.setconfig.md) 设置全局默认， 也可以直接在 `LoadComponent(...)` 中特别指明

## Example


```js
  const OnError = ({message}) => <div>{message}</div>
  const OnLoading = () => <div>loading...</div>

  const Article = LoadComponent('article', 'main', {OnLoading, OnError})
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [OnError?](./vue-web.loadcomponentoptions.onerror.md) | Component&lt;{ message: string; }&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [OnLoading?](./vue-web.loadcomponentoptions.onloading.md) | Component&lt;{}&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> |
